title: Death Mask
description: Fandoms: Buffy the Vampire Slayer & SmallvilleMonths after the death of Buffy, it feels like the world is moving on without her sister, Dawn. But a strange event leads her to new kid in town, Clark Kent, who's hiding more than a few secrets. Meanwhile, a vicious killer with a connection to Dawn piles up a body count. Together, can these two teenagers stop this deadly force?
author: xoverfiend
